title: Project-Based Language Learning Design Utilizing Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and foundational understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Learners utilize smartphones as primary learning tools, requiring design considerations for offline collaboration and limited internet accessibility.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously explore and utilize language learning content using smartphone apps.
Learners can collaborate with peers to complete smartphone-based language projects through PBL (Problem-Based Learning) activities.
Learners can evaluate their learning environment and propose improvement strategies by applying the SERVQUAL framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
